header.title: Link Serializer
header.abstract: This document describes the link serializer of Cocoon.

s1.title: Link Serializer
s1.p: The link serializer generates a list of links using XLink from the sax events. Most XHTML attributes are also supported (href, src, longdesc, background). The mime-type of the output is application/x-cocoon-links. This serializer is required by the link status generator and the command line mode to follow links.
